title: Ranked is gambling, Too much negative behavior
body:
This game state is literally RNG, who gets the least toxic players win. solo/duo queue is pointless, at least Since mid last year, I will confidently say that 60%-70% are games of multiple people, either team, intentionally using in game mechanics to throw games. I see less toxic chat than what I do of people playing in such a way that is going to negatively impact games.
Riot Support can not give any advice on how to deal with such issues, all they say is to have a break which I do, I have been playing Anthem and DBD. I come back and have 1 game, 6 people in the same lobby, of ranked soloQ just int and grief. 
Can someone tell me what I am supposed to do to deal with it. Reporting isn't doing enough, muting players is pointless because its not the chat log. 
I have played league for 4 years, and this game is in a very terrible spot from what I am witnessing, and from my POV, Riot just care too much about the money now.

replies.body:
Accept that it's mostly a crapshoot for trolls/smurfs.  The good thing with the trolls/ragequitters is that if you arent one yourself (or provoking them to do it by picking disco nunu support, etc), then you rise, but slowly, as they get 5 lotto tickets for trolltown and you only get 4.

Sadly, the smurf is statistically more likely to be on the other team.

Try not raging at your 0/5 top laner, that's just what happens when a mid silver lanes vs a high plat, and its very common in early season.

Having played since S1, the game is in a fairly bad spot, but it has certainly been worse in the past.  

I don't think it's about money, unless they are cutting the teamwork in favour of 'solo carry potential' (one lane wins game) to appeal to the crowd they are losing to fortnite.  Eventually we might get a realisation that 'solo carry potential' is code for '8 players get little or no say in the game outcome'.

Worse now because the ranked matchmaking system intentionally gives you THE worst players possible and make sure the enemy may as well be freakin Challenger. 
My average team is an afk farming adc, a jg that doesnt know what ganking is, a inting top and a non communicating mid. 
Whats worse is, even if you report them, nothing gets done. 

Im just saying, even gamblings safer than ranked queues.

I know I am not talented, but I know what I need to do to win lane and what I have to do in team fights, personally I need to work on rotations in the mid game, and I really need to work on lane control. 

behavior mixed with the meta, lobbies are horrible from my personal experience, and It is something that is out of control to individual players, at least from my personal experience. Does not just go for the teams I get put on also goes for the other side

Then work on those rather than complaining about things that is out of your control. 

If your ability alone is not enought to make progress, then the answer is a very easy one; Be happy with what you have. Not chasing things that you are not good enough to attain. 

This is what most of these complaints are. The players are not good enough to climb higher on their skills alone. To make up for this hurtful fact, they would inject every little things they can find to negate it.

Guess what? life isnt fair. Not all of us are meant to stand on the same plateau. That is why rank exist. Hierachy is actually a thing in real life. Just accept your short coming and be happy with what you have instead of wanting to be higher and higher. All the while, delude yourself into believing you have the skills, but not the opportunity.

you're deluded if you think games are not a coin flip (assuming equally matched players). the reality is some people will get the short end of the stick, others will get lucky. an elo system based on 1v1 does not work for this game and creates such a toxic atmosphere (especially when you couple it with the snowbally nature of the game). needs a huge revamp. i mean, even riot finally is taking steps to improve it (but i think they actually made things worse if u listen to na players) with the role ranks.

This is not monopoly. This is a playing field where skills speak the loudest. 

What you are refering to is this thinly thought out aspect of; We all have the same starting capital "Example, monopoly", those who are at the top, get there by luck; And the poor unlucky people such as yourself, who did not make it there because the dice rolls was not in your favour.

You are ignoring the major factor of ABILITY. You think nothing about those who's rank's bellow your. But you cant accept you are not good enough to climb to the spot of those who is infront of you. What if my rank is beneath your? and i say you got there by luck. And it should've been me??. 

The one who is wrap in a deluded state is not me. It is you guys who think you should be higher. Like all those bellow you who think they should have your position. And not you. 

Like WTF Do you want? this is rank! hierachy is what define this system. **You dont give a shit about those whose rank is  bellow your! you're just jealous of the ones that is infront of you. **

Riot can change it anyway they want to. But aslong as the word rank exist, the structure will still be the same.

I don't think you understand where I am coming from, I am not saying I should be a higher rank than what I am, I am stating that the toxicity issue's in the game is bad right now. I am blind I dont expect to even be sitting in gold

you're actually delusional mate. it has nothing to do with my personal rank or how good or bad i am. it's got to do with the elo system and the way it handles the nature of the game. if you assume all 10 players are equally matched, then it is literally a coin flip. this is true for all soloq ranks. it's exactly why w/l ratios tend to be mostly around 50%..... it's why you can totally dominate 1 match but then get completely dominated the next (snowballing) and therefore get 'stuck' (but then get called bad by people like you even though half the time they're completely dominating opponents). it's why you have people in higher ranks than they should be and ruining games. etc etc. this is all due to win/loss being the only factor in determining your so called 'skill' level. a lot of this could be evened out a bit if things like personal performance was taken into consideration on top of w/l. that would be a more accurate ranking system. it would truly (or at least do a better job than currently) weed out the bads and the goods and lessen the effect of individuals having such a positive or negative impact on the game (because of things like snowballing, feeding, afking, trolling etc). as i already pointed out, even riot knows this and took some initial steps with the whole role rank thing to try to lessen the 'rng' of people playing out of role and the impact this has on the result of the game.

this is about the quality and nature of the game and it's toxic tendencies and atmosphere it creates, not do with people thinking that they should be challenger. like, im literally talking about improving the system so it recognizes consistent good play regardless of win/loss. and the reverse of consistent bad play. it literally would make it harder for the bad people to climb. but this seems to have gone over your head.

Dude, you are bronze for almost 5years now. This is not about how the system is set up. This is about how well you're playing in the system. 

Look at you giving these false narratives.

**" if you assume all 10 players are equally matched, then it is literally a coin flip"**
IF EVERYONE IS THE SAME. THEN WHY SHOULD ANY OF YOU MOVE UP THE RANK??? I dont know how your company promote their employees. BUT SHIT. You would have to think, they'll promote the individual that stand out among their peers.

**" it's exactly why w/l ratios tend to be mostly around 50%"**
When you can NO longer carry games, and vs people equal to yourself, your win rate will even itself out to 50-55%.

**"it's why you have people in higher ranks than they should be and ruining games"**
THERE ARE PEOPLE LIKE THAT EVERYWHERE. But they are not the reason why you are stuck.

**"improving the system so it recognizes consistent good play regardless of win/loss." **
Lets be honest here, you want a system where everyones get credited even when they lose. Like how children games now aday tend not keep scores for the sake of "fun". 

Get real! aslong THERE IS RANK, and skills play a big part. The hierachy dont change. You will have high tier and low tier. Knowing how you think, you would still complains untill you reach a rank you want.

Toxic this and toxic that. EVERYONES IS BOUNDED WITHIN THE SAME SYSTEM!! WHAT MAKE OTHER PEOPLE SPECIAL? LUCK??? Not how they play the game, but which team can carry them??
On a side note. If you know about how capitalist countries are set up. You would have an understanding of how the ranking system work.
